entry.title: RT Wesley ✈️: Following @Rahatcodes' example, I'll give away my $CODE allocation ✨ a total of 4 @developer_dao memberships (I'll double the 800 tok...
entry.summary: RT Wesley ✈️ Following @Rahatcodes' example, I'll give away my $CODE allocation ✨ a total of 4 @developer_dao memberships (I'll double the 800 tokens I got from the airdrop) Similar rules as Rahat 👀 - NO DMs - Reply what you're working on and how you think D_D can help - winners by EOY rahat.eth: In December I am going to personally give away 10 @developer_dao memberships using my $Code token allocation. One way to get into Developer DAO is by owning 400 $Code Tokens. See thread below on how to enter, make sure you actually read through everything.

A @developer_dao project 🛠

With a simple, fast, and secure web application, we’re making it easier than ever to request payments in web3 💪 http://wooppay.xyz
